item.title: Yet Another day
item.description: “Yet Another Day” was written during COVID-19 lockdowns. It’s a soundtrack for a day in the life of a person who doesn’t leave their home. Featuring Chris del Camino on saxophone in “Midnight Inspiration” Composed, recorded, and mixed by Megus Artwork by Pink Rozezzz Mastered by Sergey Kosov

item.title: Megus & Lisandra — Otaku on Video
item.description: A theme song for a Russian video project about anime “Otaku on video”. Music by Megus Lyrics and vocals by Lisandra Artwork by Lena Hemomo

item.title: Counting Clouds
item.description: Megus played a live show at Voronezh Anime Festival in 2017 and released studio recording of all songs as an album. All songs are covers except for the opening track. Artwork by Anna Petrova

item.title: Selected Chiptune Works
item.description: A compilation of the best music Megus wrote on ZX Spectrum for AY-3-8910(12)/YM-2149F sound chip between 1997 and 2002. Artwork by Alexander “PheeL” Filyanov

item.title: Teleidofusion — Around Past
item.description: Teleidofusion is a music project by Seajeff and Megus. Their music is a fusion of 8-bit sounds, synthesizers and real instruments. All music by Teleidofusion except “Fat Cat Wants Tasty Fish” by Alexander “Manwe” Matchugovsky Megus — guitars, bass (3, 5, 10), shakuhachi (2), jaw harp (2), vocals (7) Seajeff — keyboards, vocals (7) Chris del Camino — alto saxophone (5) Artwork by Sergey “RayNoa” Kostik

item.title: The Rising Sun
item.description: This is the soundtrack for the Japanese visual novel “The Rising Sun: Oceanic Suspense Adventure” by SGP Software. Only the first two tracks were used in the game itself, the other four are remixes made by Megus for the soundtrack CD. “Land and Sea” and “Winter Road” are composed by Megus. Lyrics are poems by Alexander Pushkin “The Following Move” and “The Rising Sun” are composed by IOSYS Vocals by ジェーニャ Jenya

item.title: Demoscene
item.description: PICONICCC PICO8 demo by Megus, deMarche, and Stardust. PICONICCC on pouët.net PICOCHAK PICO8 demo by Megus and Stardust. 🏆 2nd place in Console Demo Compo at CAFe'2019 PICOCHAK on pouët.net Counting Clouds Game Boy Advance demo by Brainwave 🏆 9th place in Mobile Demo Compo at Assembly'2003 Counting Clouds on pouët.net Stellar Contour ZX Spectrum demo by Brainwave 🏆 1st place in ZX Demo Compo at Chaos Constructions'2001 Stellar Contour on pouët.
